member.name: T:BookPubDB.DTOs.EntityMapper
member.summary: Provides an extension method for mapping properties from a DTO (Data Transfer Object) to an entity object. This utility class helps synchronize data between different layers of the application.

member.name: M:BookPubDB.DTOs.EntityMapper.MapDto
member.summary: Maps properties from a DTO to an entity of the same property names and types.
member.typeparam: The DTO type containing the source properties.
The entity type that will receive the mapped values.
member.param: The entity to which properties will be mapped.
The DTO containing the property values.
member.exception: Thrown when either the DTO or the entity is null.
